articles.title: Israel Intercepts Gaza-Bound Aid Ship With Greta Thunberg Aboard
articles.description: Israel had vowed to prevent the vessel from reaching Gaza, saying its military would use “any means necessary” to stop it from breaching a naval blockade.
articles.content:
The Israeli Foreign Ministry said early on Monday morning that a Gaza-bound ship carrying a dozen pro-Palestinian activists and some aid had been diverted toward Israeli shores and that its passengers were expected to return to their home countries.

articles.description: NSW Blues coach L﻿aurie Daley has made just one change to his side for the next State of Origin game, with prop Stefano Utoikamanu earning a recall in the front-row rotation after Mitch Barnett suffered an ACL injury.
articles.content:
NSW Blues coach Laurie Daley has made just one change to his side for game two, with prop Stefano Utoikamanu earning a recall in the front-row rotation.

articles.title: Measles cases are surging globally. Should children be vaccinated earlier in Australia?
articles.description: In light of current outbreaks globally, is there a case for reviewing the timing of measles vaccinations in Australia?
articles.content:
Measles has been rising globally in recent years. There were an estimated 10.3 million cases worldwide in 2023, a 20 per cent increase from 2022.
Outbreaks are being reported all over the world including in the United States, Europe and the Western P... [6640 chars]

articles.title: Microsoft and ASUS introduced the ROG Xbox Ally console • Mezha.Media
articles.description: The gaming console from Microsoft and ASUS runs on an adapted version of Windows 11, optimized for touch and gamepad controls. The console will be available in two versions: the basic Xbox Ally and the flagship Xbox Ally X.

articles.title: Ukraine says Russia launched 479 drones in the war's biggest overnight drone bombardment
articles.description: Russia launched 479 drones at Ukraine in the war's biggest overnight drone bombardment, the Ukrainian air f...
articles.content:
Russia launched 479 drones at Ukraine in the war's biggest overnight drone bombardment, the Ukrainian air force said today.
Apart from drones, 20 missiles of various types were fired at different parts of Ukraine, the air force said.

articles.description: Jed Scanlon, from Derry, was rushed to hospital by parents Amanda, 39, and David, 40, after he came down with a high temperature - and was later diagnosed with herpes simplex
articles.content:
